Forties.text:
Wind
In northeast, northwesterly veering northerly, 4 to 6. In southwest, northwesterly 3 to 5 becoming variable 2 to 4 then northerly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 later.
Sea state
In northeast, moderate or rough. in southwest, moderate or rough, occasionally very rough later.
Weather
In northeast, squally wintry showers. In southwest, showers, becoming squally and wintry.
Visibility
In northeast, good, occasionally very poor. In southwest, good, occasionally poor.
